I can guide you through any queries related to Bhilai Institute of Technology Durg
Offering support for queries related to BIT Durg

BIT-Durg was established in 1986, it was affiliated to Pandit Ravishankar Shukla University, Raipur and started offering Bachelor of Engineering in Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics and Telecommunication and Mechanical Engineering with an intake capacity of 180 students.

patterns: How many Block's are there in BIT Durg
how many building are there in bit durg
responses: There are a total of 5 block's in BIT Durg.

patterns: Which branch's are offered in bit durg
What are the branch present in bit durg
How many branch are there in bit durg
responses: BIT offers Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Civil Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Computer Science Engineering (Specalization in AI and Data Science), Information Technology etc.

patterns: What are the courses offered in BIT Durg
what are the program offered in bit durg
responses: The Programmes offered by the institute can be broadly classified as follows: Undergraduate programmes, Postgraduate programmes,Doctorate programmes

patterns: How can we get admission in BIT durg
what are the ways to get admission in BIT Durg
responses: The Institute admits undergraduate students through CGPET and JEE-Main, MCA students through AIMCET, MBA students through MAT and M.E/M.Tech students through GATE.
Who caresabout your thought
HOD i.e Head of department. Each department has their own respective HOD. Which Head of Department do you want to know about?

patterns: Who is the HOD of CSE Department?
Who is the HOD of Computer Science Department
responses: Dr. Sunita Soni is the HOD of CSE Department.

patterns: Who is the HOD of IT Department?
Who is the hod of information and technology HOD
responses: Dr. Ani Thomas is the Head of IT Department.

patterns: Who is the HOD of Civil Department?
responses: Dr. S. K . Jaiswal is the Head of IT Department.

patterns: Who is the HOD of EEE Department?
responses: Dr. (Mrs.) Surekha Bhusnur is the Head of EEE Department.

patterns: Who is the HOD of EE Department?
Who is the head of Electrical Engineering
responses: Dr. Soorya Prakash Shukla is the Head of EE Department.

patterns: Who is the HOD of ETC Department?
Who is the head of Electronic's and Telecommunication
responses: Dr. Arun Kumar is the Head of ETC Department.
